item.alchemind.blank_sigil.tool_tip: Pour Essence and Drain it out to get 100mb more than you put in! Convert Pewter to Essence
block.alchemind.crystal_glass.tool_tip: It sees through what eyes cannot...
block.alchemind.zoomdust_block.tooltip: Moves you against your will when stood on
alchemind.ponder.accelerator_scene.heade: Rotating an Accelerator to manage Arcana Machines
alchemind.ponder.accelerator_scene.text_: The Accelerator is used to Manage Arcana Machines beneath it, like this radiator
The Accelerator's speed controls the efficiency of the machine beneath it, but the Accelerator is very Stress intensive
As you can see, it has a wide variety of applications
alchemind.ponder.catalyzer_scene.header: Using a Potion Catalyzer to improve Accelerator Efficiency
alchemind.ponder.catalyzer_scene.text_1: When your Accelerator isn't cutting it, you can introduce a Potion Catalyzer above it to improve it
alchemind.ponder.catalyzer_scene.text_2: Place a potion catalyzer above the Accelerator, and a Fluid Tank above the Catalyzer
alchemind.ponder.catalyzer_scene.text_3: The Catalyzer uses potion fluid in the tank above it, the rate of which is controlled by the speed of accelerator
alchemind.ponder.catalyzer_scene.text_4: You can use any potion, but all potions are considered equal to the Potion Catalyzer
alchemind.ponder.catalyzer_scene.text_5: The Potion Catalyzer, when functioning, quadruples the effective speed of the Accelerator
alchemind.ponder.essence_mixer_scene.hea: Mixing Essences with an Essene Mixer
alchemind.ponder.essence_mixer_scene.tex: The essence mixer pulls from the 3 drains below it to make new essences
It Requires Arcana and an Accelerator, which control the speed of the machine
The fluids must be placed in the drains in the proper order based on the recipe shown in JEI
If enough Arcana is provided, the recipe completes, and the resulting fluid can be extracted from the Essence Mixer
You may want to consider using Mechanical Arms and Spouts to insert fluids automatically, but using belts may work
alchemind.ponder.compound_essence_radiat: Compound Essences made with the Essence Mixer create more Arcana per mB for fluid
This makes arcana storage more compact. Potere is especially Arcana dense
alchemind.ponder.arcana_infuser_scene.he: Infusing Items with Arcana using the Arcana Infuser
alchemind.ponder.arcana_infuser_scene.te: The Arcana Infuser can be used to infuse items below it
It requires an Arcana Accelerator, the speed of the Infuser is based on it's speed
Don't forget to provide Arcana, the Infuser usually needs a lot.
alchemind.ponder.mineral_extractor_scene: The Mineral Extractor removes material from the block beneath it using Arcana
It requires an Arcana Accelerator, which controls its extraction speed
Different Recipes use different amounts of Arcana
Different Recipes have different chances to successfully extract, as well to break the source block when the recipe is successful
alchemind.ponder.arcana_radiator_scene.t: Arcana is a magical energy used to power various machines
Its produced though the Arcana Radiator, using Essence liquid
Like all arcana machines, an Arcana Accelerator is required above it for it to function
The Accelerator requires Rotational Energy, its speed controls the speed of the Radiator
The Radiator will send arcana to all Adjacent blocks, like this mineral extractor
alchemind.ponder.heated_essence_radiatin: When your radiator isn't providing arcana fast enough you can multiply its efficiency with heating
Even while heating is provided, the Accelerator's speed still takes an effect on the radiator
Place and heat a blase burner below
Only fueled burners improve the radiator, superheated burners even more so
you may want to consider adding a system to input fuel automatically using a mechanical arm
